name: Sali Siemen
career_objective: Final-year B.Tech CSE (Cyber Security) student with hands-on experience in cloud-like infrastructure setup, server deployment, and networking. Built and deployed a production-level self-hosted server using public IP, DNS mapping, and port forwarding. Strong understanding of DevOps practices, containerization, and system security. Seeking roles in Cloud Engineering, DevOps, and Infrastructure Management.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering (Cyber Security)
education.institution: St. Ann's College of Engineering & Technology

projects.title: DCode Systems – Self-Hosted Cloud-Based LMS Platform
projects.description: Designed and deployed a full-stack Learning Management System (LMS) with authentication and scalable backend services. Transformed a personal system into a production-like cloud server environment. Configured port forwarding, DNS mapping, and public IP exposure for live access. Managed backend deployment using Docker containers and Kubernetes basics. Monitored system availability and handled service uptime.
features: Online coding execution using Judge0 API
Self-hosted on personal computer with public IP and port forwarding

projects.title: Cyber-Physical System Security for Industry 4.0
projects.description: Final Year Project (Ongoing) – CNN-LSTM-based intrusion detection system developed using Python Flask for securing cyber-physical systems in Industry 4.0 environments.
